dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, did you catch the news about Kazakhstan's new broadband project?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, did you catch the news about Kazakhstan's new broadband project?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, uh, no, I don't think so. What's going on over there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, uh, no, I don't think so. What's going on over there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's pretty big. Back in October 2018, their Ministry of Information and Communications, like, signed this huge PPP agreement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's pretty big. Back in October twenty eighteen, their Ministry of Information and Communications, like, signed this huge P P P agreement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the official ceremony holding on October 4, 2018, the Ministry of information and communications of Republic of Kazakhstan, Transtelecom JSC, the consortium SilkNetCom LLP, and Kazakhtelecom JSC have signed the PPP agreement for the project named Providing broadband access to rural areas of the Republic of Kazakhstan using the technology of fiber-optical communication lines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: PPP, okay. Who all was involved, do you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: P P P, okay. Who all was involved, do you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Transtelecom, SilkNetCom, Kazakhtelecom. All these big players, you know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Transtelecom, SilkNetCom, Kazakhtelecom. All these big players, you know.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the official ceremony holding on October 4, 2018, the Ministry of information and communications of Republic of Kazakhstan, Transtelecom JSC, the consortium SilkNetCom LLP, and Kazakhtelecom JSC have signed the PPP agreement...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And what's the aim of this, um, big project?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And what's the aim of this, um, big project?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's all about getting broadband access, specifically fiber-optic, to rural areas across Kazakhstan. It's a massive undertaking, 13 years long!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all about getting broadband access, specifically fiber-optic, to rural areas across Kazakhstan. It's a massive undertaking, thirteen years long!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Providing broadband access to rural areas of the Republic of Kazakhstan using the technology of fiber-optical communication lines. The project realization period is expected to be 13 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Thirteen years? Wow, that's a serious commitment. So, what are the, like, real-world benefits for people living in those rural areas?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thirteen years? Wow, that's a serious commitment. So, what are the, like, real-world benefits for people living in those rural areas?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the CEO of Transtelecom, Zhanbolat Nadyrov, he actually said students will get to improve their knowledge, and residents can finally access public services online.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the C E O of Transtelecom, Zhanbolat Nadyrov, he actually said students will get to improve their knowledge, and residents can finally access public services online.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zhanbolat Nadyrov, CEO of Transtelecom JSC, represented the company. Due to the Internet access rural school students will get the opportunity to improve their knowledge, and the residents will be able to receive public services online.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's huge! So, it's really about tackling that digital inequality, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's huge! So, it's really about tackling that digital inequality, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Exactly! And not just that, uh, better digital literacy, e-commerce development, all boosting their economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And not just that, uh, better digital literacy, e-commerce development, all boosting their economy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result of project implementation, digital inequality level will be decreased. Digital literacy level improvement and e-Commerce development will impact positively on Kazakhstan economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That makes sense. How are they, you know, physically rolling this out? Is it just everywhere?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That makes sense. How are they, you know, physically rolling this out? Is it just everywhere?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They're laying 6,000 kilometers of fiber-optic cables, like, along the railways.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're laying six thousand kilometers of fiber-optic cables, like, along the railways.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thus, within the framework of the project, TTC will conduct 6,000 km of fiber-optic communication wires along the railways...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Along the railways, that's smart. And how many places are we talking about here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Along the railways, that's smart. And how many places are we talking about here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Four hundred twenty-one rural settlements, and over a thousand local schools, hospitals, police stations, you name it. All getting 20 megabits per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Four hundred twenty-one rural settlements, and over a thousand local schools, hospitals, police stations, you name it. All getting twenty megabits per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...which will provide 421 rural settlements and 1222 local schools, hospitals, local state bodies, police stations and other institutions with the Internet access at a high speed of 20 Mbit/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Twenty Mbps is, uh, pretty solid for rural access. Any immediate impact?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Twenty Mbps is, uh, pretty solid for rural access. Any immediate impact?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, apparently, they already provided internet to 48 villages and 150 local state bodies just this year, which is, like, pretty quick.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, apparently, they already provided internet to forty eight villages and one hundred fifty local state bodies just this year, which is, like, pretty quick.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was reported that already this year, TTC will provide 48 villages and 150 local state bodies with Internet access.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's impressive. So, what's next? Is this just about internet, or are they thinking bigger?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's impressive. So, what's next? Is this just about internet, or are they thinking bigger?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nadyrov actually mentioned it's a foundation for future projects: Smart Schools, telemedicine, even, um, 'safe city' initiatives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nadyrov actually mentioned it's a foundation for future projects: Smart Schools, telemedicine, even, um, safe city initiatives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zhanbolat Nadyrov also added that the project will be implemented with the long term prospects, so the fiber-optic infrastructure will become as the foundation for a number of future projects such as Smart schools, telemedicine and safe city.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so it's really building out their whole, like, digital future. Transtelecom sounds like a key player in all this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so it's really building out their whole, like, digital future. Transtelecom sounds like a key player in all this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They absolutely are. They're one of the biggest communication operators there, specializing in all sorts of digitalization and system integration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They absolutely are. They're one of the biggest communication operators there, specializing in all sorts of digitalization and system integration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Transtelecom JSC is one of the largest communication operators in the Republic of Kazakhstan that specialize in provision of a wide range of telecommunication services, digitalization and system integration in the field of IT, communications, automation and energy.
